dailySpecials.name: Pot Roast Dinner
dailySpecials.description: Slow-cooked pot roast with carrots, potatoes, and onions. Served with a dinner roll.

dailySpecials.name: Homemade Meatloaf
dailySpecials.description: Our famous meatloaf recipe served with creamy mashed potatoes, fresh green beans, and a dinner roll.

dailySpecials.name: Country Fried Chicken
dailySpecials.description: Crispy fried chicken served with mashed potatoes, gravy, and corn on the cob.

dailySpecials.name: Shepherd's Pie
dailySpecials.description: Hearty ground beef and vegetables topped with creamy mashed potatoes and baked golden brown.

dailySpecials.name: BBQ Ribs Platter
dailySpecials.description: Fall-off-the-bone ribs with our house BBQ sauce, coleslaw, and cornbread.

dailySpecials.name: Fish Fry Special
dailySpecials.description: Beer-battered cod served with french fries, coleslaw, and tartar sauce.

dailySpecials.name: Prime Rib Special
dailySpecials.description: 12oz prime rib cooked to perfection, served with baked potato and seasonal vegetables.
